attributes.review: This is a horrible app! I was spammed with calls and texts all day long after it asked for my phone number! It drained my phone battery fairly quickly! And I had to end up deleting the app because it took up half of my storage!
attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to pay my respects to the late President Trump, then I remembered that he’s a racist, white supremacist who refuses to support racial equality and social justice. He abuses his power daily and conducts himself as a child when he is supposed to represent the United States as a whole. This creature is an embarrassment and we do not claim him. VOTE HIM OUT.
attributes.title: Absolute trash

attributes.review: if i could give this app 0 stars i genuinely would. i love and support trump and was going to use this as a way to be more open about my beliefs but this app was absolutely AWFUL. i had the worst experience with this app. i do not recommend downloading it’s a waste of time 🙄.
attributes.title: yes😌💅🏽✨

attributes.review: I got this app to support our great and almighty god of a president but was greatly disappointed. I wanted to come on and here him telling police to push down 75 year olds and shoot unarmed protesters but I couldn’t seem to find that section. Surely our god of a president could do better.
attributes.title: Wow :(

attributes.review: I was so impressed that I could get up to date information on our wonderful President Trump.
attributes.title: LOVE THIS APP

attributes.review: It asks for so much personal information, doesn’t tell you what they’re going to do with it, and doesn’t give you much In return. Is the campaign making money by selling our personal data?
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I don’t even know how or why but I clicked no on permissions to access my camera but it just kept opening the camera and recording video all the time when I opened this app.
attributes.title: Used my camera without my permission

attributes.review: even if you support him you’ll still hate giving all your personal info away, because all his supporters seem to care about is their own money instead of other people’s LIVES.
attributes.title: horrible app, not surprised

attributes.review: Let’s just say it was like a tinder hookup. Intrigued me enough to answer all the questions but then left me hanging and wanting to walk home in the middle of winter in Alaska without a coat on. Will be deleting, not worth the time or effort if I’m not getting any benefits.
attributes.title: Like a tinder date but worse...

attributes.review: So i downloaded this app to praise our lord and savior trump😌 but then i come across a problem😔all i saw was how much small dick energy was in the app🤡 we hate to see it but oh well guess that’s what happens when ur a child rapist🤩 take this down it’s also glitchy and laggy😻
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
